metadata.description: Major high-voltage substations and generators across all Canadian provinces - 735kV, 500kV, 345kV, 230kV infrastructure
metadata.coverage: All Canadian provinces - Hydro-Quebec, Ontario IESO, BC Hydro, Manitoba Hydro, SaskPower, AESO (Alberta), NB Power, NS Power, NL Hydro
metadata.notes: Comprehensive Canadian transmission infrastructure including James Bay complex, Churchill Falls, BC Interior-Coast transmission, Alberta 500kV backbone, Manitoba HVDC ties, and cross-border interconnections with US grid

interconnection.name: Canadian Grid
interconnection.description: Canadian electrical grid spanning Eastern Interconnection (Quebec, Ontario, Maritimes) and Western Interconnection (BC, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba)

nodes.name: La Grande-2 (Robert-Bourassa)
nodes.notes: Largest generating station in Canada, part of James Bay Project

nodes.name: Manic-5 (Daniel-Johnson)
nodes.notes: Famous multiple-arch dam on Manicouagan River

nodes.name: Gentilly-2
nodes.notes: Former nuclear plant, now decommissioned - substation remains

nodes.name: Radisson
nodes.notes: Major 735kV switching station near La Grande complex

nodes.name: Hertel
nodes.notes: Major interconnection point for HVDC ties to New England

nodes.name: Des Cantons
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station for Phase II tie to New England

nodes.name: Nicolet
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station

nodes.name: Churchill Falls
nodes.notes: Second largest hydro plant in Canada, power contracted to Hydro-Quebec

nodes.name: Muskrat Falls
nodes.notes: Part of Lower Churchill Project

nodes.name: Soldiers Pond
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station for Maritime Link

nodes.name: Holyrood
nodes.notes: Oil-fired thermal plant

nodes.name: Woodbine
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station for Maritime Link

nodes.name: Annapolis Tidal
nodes.notes: Tidal power generating station

nodes.name: Point Lepreau
nodes.notes: Only nuclear plant in Atlantic Canada

nodes.name: Eel River
nodes.notes: Back-to-back HVDC converter for Quebec tie

nodes.name: Bruce A
nodes.notes: Bruce A units 1-4

nodes.name: Bruce B
nodes.notes: Bruce B units 5-8, largest nuclear plant in the world

nodes.name: Pickering
nodes.notes: Currently operational units 5-8

nodes.name: Sir Adam Beck 2
nodes.notes: Includes pumped storage

nodes.name: Nanticoke
nodes.notes: Former coal plant converted to natural gas, major 500kV switching station

nodes.name: Lennox
nodes.notes: Peaking plant, can also burn oil

nodes.name: Beach
nodes.notes: Near Niagara interconnection

nodes.name: Hawthorne
nodes.notes: Ottawa area major switching station

nodes.name: St. Lawrence
nodes.notes: Includes R.H. Saunders and Moses-Saunders facilities

nodes.name: Henday
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station - Bipole III

nodes.name: Radisson (MB)
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station - Bipole I/II northern terminal

nodes.name: Dorsey
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station - Bipole I/II southern terminal near Winnipeg

nodes.name: Riel
nodes.notes: HVDC converter station - Bipole III southern terminal

nodes.name: Keewatinohk
nodes.notes: Newest generating station, commissioned 2021

nodes.name: Glenboro
nodes.notes: Interconnection point with Saskatchewan

nodes.name: Boundary Dam
nodes.notes: Includes carbon capture facility on Unit 3

nodes.name: Keephills
nodes.notes: Keephills 1, 2, and 3

nodes.name: Peigan
nodes.notes: Major interconnection point

nodes.name: Pincher Creek
nodes.notes: Wind farm interconnection hub

nodes.name: Mica Dam
nodes.notes: Largest generating station in BC

nodes.name: Gordon M. Shrum (W.A.C. Bennett Dam)
nodes.notes: Peace River project, one of largest earth-fill dams in the world

nodes.name: Site C Dam
nodes.notes: Under construction, expected completion 2025

nodes.name: Kemano
nodes.notes: Powers aluminum smelter at Kitimat

nodes.name: Burrard
nodes.notes: Standby capacity, used for system emergencies

nodes.name: Ingledow
nodes.notes: Major switching station for Vancouver area

nodes.name: Custer (BC side)
nodes.notes: BC side of cross-border tie to BPA Custer

nodes.name: Boundary (BC)
nodes.notes: Near Boundary Dam interconnection

nodes.name: Massena (QC side)
nodes.notes: 765kV interconnection with NYISO

nodes.name: Niagara Falls (ON side)
nodes.notes: Major interconnection with NYISO

nodes.name: St. Clair (ON side)
nodes.notes: Michigan interconnection

nodes.name: Gretna
nodes.notes: US interconnection point - tie to MISO
